name: Penguin (LordZethan)
description:
From that one guy that made Space Odyssey Kid comes Penguin! The game where you are Pengi the Penguin, and your penguin friend has been penguin-napped and it is up to you to save her! Did I mention that there are penguins? 

Travel through mountains, fighting evil goblins, slimes, bats and dragons. Use your special penguin powers of shooting ice pellets (that's something penguins do, right?). Collect gold diamonds to earn the ultimate reward of looking stylish with hats!

So, what are you waiting for? Grab some fish sticks, open a cold one, and download some sweet, sweet awesomeness!
